8 LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::LccpSegmentationAlgorithm(ros::NodeHandle *handle, const Parameters &param, std::string name):
9  nh_(*handle), service_name_(name){
10  ROS_INFO("Segmentation server started");
11  this->param_.zmin = param.zmin;
12  this->param_.zmax = param.zmax;
13  this->param_.th_points = param.th_points;
14  this->param_.disable_transform = param.disable_transform;
15  this->param_.voxel_resolution = param.voxel_resolution;
16  this->param_.seed_resolution = param.seed_resolution;
17  this->param_.color_importance = param.color_importance;
18  this->param_.spatial_importance = param.spatial_importance;
19  this->param_.normal_importance = param.normal_importance;
20  this->param_.concavity_tolerance_threshold = param.concavity_tolerance_threshold;
21  this->param_.smoothness_threshold = param.smoothness_threshold;
22  this->param_.min_segment_size = param.min_segment_size;
23  this->param_.use_extended_convexity = param.use_extended_convexity;
24  this->param_.use_sanity_criterion = param.use_sanity_criterion;
25  segmentation_server_ = nh_.advertiseService(service_name_, &LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::segmentationCallback, this);
26  pthread_mutex_init(&this->obj_seg_mutex_, NULL);
27 }

41 bool LccpSegmentationAlgorithm::segmentationCallback(sq_fitting::segment_object::Request &req,
42  sq_fitting::segment_object::Response &res){
43  this->obj_seg_mutex_enter_();
44  CloudPtr cloud(new PointCloud);
45  pcl::fromROSMsg(req.input_cloud, *cloud);
46  std::unique_ptr<lccp_segmentation> seg(new lccp_segmentation);
47  seg->init(*cloud, this->param_);
48  std::vector<Object> seg_objs;
49  seg->segment();
50  seg_objs = seg->get_segmented_objects();
51 
52  //Table cloud
53  CloudPtr table_cloud = seg->get_plane_cloud();
54  pcl::toROSMsg(*table_cloud, res.plane_cloud);
55 
56  //Object clouds
57  for(uint i=0;i<seg_objs.size();++i){
58  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 obj_msg;
59  pcl::toROSMsg(seg_objs[i].obj_cloud, obj_msg);
60  obj_msg.header.seq = i;
61  obj_msg.header.frame_id = req.input_cloud.header.frame_id;
62  obj_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
63  res.object_cloud.push_back(obj_msg);
64  }
65  this->obj_seg_mutex_exit_();
66  return true;
67 }

153 CloudPtr lccp_segmentation::get_plane_cloud(){
154  return this->table_plane_cloud_;

156 
157 void lccp_segmentation::detectObjectsOnTable(CloudPtr cloud, double zmin, double zmax, pcl::PointIndices::Ptr objectIndices, bool filter_input_cloud){
158  //objects for storing point clouds
159  CloudPtr plane(new PointCloud);
160  CloudPtr convexHull(new PointCloud);
161 
162  //Get the plane model, if present
163  pcl::SACSegmentation<PointT> segmentation;
164  segmentation.setInputCloud(cloud);
165  segmentation.setModelType(pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
166  segmentation.setMethodType(pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
167  segmentation.setDistanceThreshold(0.01);
168  segmentation.setOptimizeCoefficients(true);
169  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr planeIndices(new pcl::PointIndices);
170  segmentation.segment(*planeIndices, this->plane_coefficients_);
171 
172  if(planeIndices->indices.size() == 0)
173  std::cout<<"Could not find a plane in the scene."<<std::endl;
174  else{
175  //Copy the points of the plane to a new cloud
176  pcl::ExtractIndices<PointT> extract;
177  extract.setInputCloud(cloud);
178  extract.setIndices(planeIndices);
179  extract.filter(*plane);
180 
181  //Retrive the convex hull
182  pcl::ConvexHull<PointT> hull;
183  hull.setInputCloud(plane);
184  hull.setDimension(2);
185  hull.reconstruct(*convexHull);
186 
187  //redundant check
188  if(hull.getDimension() == 2){
189  //prism object
190  pcl::ExtractPolygonalPrismData<PointT> prism;
191  prism.setInputCloud(cloud);
192  prism.setInputPlanarHull(convexHull);
193  prism.setHeightLimits(zmin, zmax);
194  prism.segment(*objectIndices);
195  extract.setIndices(objectIndices);
196  if(filter_input_cloud)
197  extract.filter(*cloud);
198  }
199  else std::cout<<"The chosen hull is not planar."<<std::endl;
200  this->table_plane_cloud_ = plane;
201  }
202 }
203 
204 std::vector<PointCloud> lccp_segmentation::get_segmented_objects_simple(){
205  std::vector<PointCloud> obj_vec;
206  for(int i = 0; i < this->detected_objects_.size(); ++i)
207  obj_vec.push_back(detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud);
208  return obj_vec;
209 }
210 
211 std::vector<Object> lccp_segmentation::get_segmented_objects(){
212  return this->detected_objects_;
213 }
214 
215 bool lccp_segmentation::segment(){
216  if(!this->initialized_){
217  pcl::console::print_error("No valid input given to the algorithm. The class has not been initialized");
218  return false;
219  }
220  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr obj_idx(new pcl::PointIndices());
221  detectObjectsOnTable(this->cloud_, this->zmin, this->zmax, obj_idx, true);
222  if(this->seed_resolution < 0.013)
223  pcl::console::print_warn("seed resolution very low, the segmentation could be fragmented.");
224  pcl::SupervoxelClustering<PointT> super(this->voxel_resolution, this->seed_resolution);
225  detected_objects_.resize(0);
226  if(this->cloud_->points.size() == 0){
227  pcl::console::print_warn("No objects on the table");
228  return false;
229  }
230  super.setInputCloud(this->cloud_);
231  super.setColorImportance(this->color_importance);
232  super.setSpatialImportance(this->spatial_importance);
233  super.setNormalImportance(this->normal_importance);
234 
235  super.extract(supervoxel_clusters_);
236  labeled_voxel_cloud_ = super.getLabeledVoxelCloud();
237  CloudPtr voxel_cetroid_cloud = super.getVoxelCentroidCloud();
238  normal_cloud_ = super.makeSupervoxelNormalCloud(supervoxel_clusters_);
239  PointCloudl::Ptr full_labeled_cloud = super.getLabeledCloud();
240  super.getSupervoxelAdjacency(supervoxel_adjacency_);
241  std::map<uint32_t, pcl::Supervoxel<PointT>::Ptr> refined_supervoxel_clusters;
242 
243  PointCloudl::Ptr refined_labeled_voxel_cloud = super.getLabeledVoxelCloud();
244  pcl::PointCloud<pcl::PointNormal>::Ptr refined_sv_normal_cloud = super.makeSupervoxelNormalCloud(refined_supervoxel_clusters);
245  PointCloudl::Ptr refined_full_labeled_cloud = super.getLabeledCloud();
246 
247  typedef boost::adjacency_list<boost::setS, boost::setS, boost::undirectedS, uint32_t, float> VoxelAdjacencyList;
248  VoxelAdjacencyList supervoxel_adjacency_list;
249  super.getSupervoxelAdjacencyList(supervoxel_adjacency_list);
250 
251  uint k_factor = 0;
252  if(use_extended_convexity)
253  k_factor = 1;
254 
255  pcl::LCCPSegmentation<PointT> lccp;
256  lccp.setConcavityToleranceThreshold(this->concavity_tolerance_threshold);
257  lccp.setSanityCheck(this->use_sanity_criterion);
258  lccp.setSmoothnessCheck(true, this->voxel_resolution, this->seed_resolution, this->smoothness_threshold);
259  lccp.setKFactor(k_factor);
260  lccp.setInputSupervoxels(this->supervoxel_clusters_, this->supervoxel_adjacency_);
261  lccp.setMinSegmentSize(this->min_segment_size);
262  lccp.segment();
263 
264  PointCloudl::Ptr labeled_cloud = super.getLabeledCloud();
265  lccp_labeled_cloud_ = labeled_cloud->makeShared();
266  lccp.relabelCloud(*lccp_labeled_cloud_);
267 
268  for(int i=0;i < lccp_labeled_cloud_->points.size(); ++i){
269  uint32_t idx = lccp_labeled_cloud_->points.at(i).label;
270  if(idx >= detected_objects_.size())
271  detected_objects_.resize(idx+1);
272  PointT tmp_point_rgb;
273  tmp_point_rgb = cloud_->points.at(i);
274  detected_objects_[idx].obj_cloud.points.push_back(tmp_point_rgb);
275  detected_objects_[idx].label = (int)idx;
276  }
277 
278  int size = detected_objects_.size();
279  int i = 0;
280  while(i<size){
281  if(detected_objects_[i].obj_cloud.size() < this->th_points){
282  detected_objects_.erase(detected_objects_.begin()+i);
283  size = detected_objects_.size();
284  }
285  else
286  i++;
287  }
288  return true;
289 }

lccp_segmentation
Class to detect table top objects in a cluttered scene segmenting the point cloud. Algorithm is based on http://docs.pointclouds.org/trunk/classpcl_1_1_l_c_c_p_segmentation.html.
